00029 //----------------------------------------------------------------------        
00036 //----------------------------------------------------------------------        
00037 //hashlib++ includes
00038 #include "hl_sha384wrapper.h"
00039 
00040 //----------------------------------------------------------------------        
00041 //STL includes
00042 #include <string>
00043 
00044 //----------------------------------------------------------------------        
00045 //private memberfunctions
00046 
00053 std::string sha384wrapper::hashIt(void)
00054 {
00055         sha2_byte buff[SHA384_DIGEST_STRING_LENGTH];
00056         sha384->SHA384_End(&context,(char*)buff);
00057         return convToString(buff);
00058 }
00059 
00068 std::string sha384wrapper::convToString(unsigned char *data)
00069 {
00070         /*
00071          * we can just copy data to a string, because 
00072          * the transforming to hash is already done
00073          * within the sha384 implementation
00074          */
00075         return std::string((const char*)data);
00076 }
00077 
00085 void sha384wrapper::updateContext(unsigned char *data, unsigned int len)
00086 {
00087         this->sha384->SHA384_Update(&context,data,len);
00088 }
00089 
00094 void sha384wrapper::resetContext(void)
00095 {
00096         sha384->SHA384_Init(&context);
00097 }
00098 
00099 //----------------------------------------------------------------------        
00100 //public memberfunctions
00101 
00105 sha384wrapper::sha384wrapper()
00106 {
00107         this->sha384 = new SHA2ext();
00108 }
00109 
00113 sha384wrapper::~sha384wrapper()
00114 {
00115         delete sha384;
00116 }
